## DescribeDefinition interface

DescribeDefinition provides static type checking for a [Command](./jambo.command.md)<!-- -->'s describe(), and ensures that the return value matches the param types of [Command](./jambo.command.md)<!-- -->'s args.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default interface DescribeDefinition<T extends ArgumentMetadataRecord = ArgumentMetadataRecord> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [displayName](./jambo.describedefinition.displayname.md) | string | Display name of the command. |
|  [params?](./jambo.describedefinition.params.md) | { \[arg in keyof T\]: DescribeDefinitionParam&lt;T\[arg\]&gt;; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional, descriptions of command parameters. |
